scenes.background: You insist on finding another solution without involving you.
scenes.description: Bob thinks it’s critical you are on the call. Can you reconsider?

options.text: I understand the importance. I’ll join briefly but prefer to stay on leave.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the importance and agreed to help briefly, showing good perception and empathy but compromising self-regulation.

options.text: I’ve already provided the necessary guidance. You can manage without me.
options.analysis: You maintained your boundaries and encouraged independence, demonstrating good self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation.

options.text: If it’s that critical, we need another solution that doesn’t involve me.
options.analysis: You set clear boundaries and suggested finding another solution, showing good self-regulation but lower empathy.
